mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM replyReport WHERE replyReportNo > 0

SELECT c.replyContent, c.replyReportNo, c.memberId, c.replyNo, c.replyReportContent, c.replyReportDate from ( select rownum rn, a.replyReportNo, a.memberId, a.replyNo, a.replyReportContent, a.replyReportDate, b.replyContent from replyReport a, reply b where a.replyNo = b.replyNo and rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) c WHERE c.rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO replyReport(replyReportNo, memberId, replyNo,replyReportContent) VALUES(seq_replyReport.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{replyNo},#{replyReportContent})
mapper.select: SELECT b.replyContent,a.replyReportNo,a.memberId,a.replyNo,a.replyReportContent,a.replyReportDate FROM replyReport a, reply b WHERE a.replyNo = b.replyNo and replyReportNo = #{replyReportNo}
